sentences.sContent: A tiger lives off some small animals.
sentences.sContent_eng: A tiger lives off some small animals.
sentences.sCn: 老虎靠吃一些小动物为生。

sentences.sContent: The magician transformed the girl into a tiger.
sentences.sContent_eng: The magician transformed the girl into a tiger.
sentences.sCn: 魔术师把那个女孩变成了一头老虎。

phrases.pCn: n. 老虎·伍兹（世界著名高尔夫球手）

words.tran: 狂暴的；残忍的；虎一般的

trans.tranOther: a large wild animal that has yellow and black lines on its body and is a member of the cat family
